org.goobi.production.export

Class ExportXmlLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.goobi.production.export.ExportXmlLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProcessDataExport

    public class ExportXmlLog
extends Object
implements IProcessDataExport
    This class provides xml logfile generation. After the generation the file will be written to user home directory
    Author:
    Robert Sehr, Steffen Hankiewicz
